Package edu.pdx.cs410J

Class LRUMapTestCase

java.lang.Object
edu.pdx.cs410J.LRUMapTestCase
public abstract class LRUMapTestCase extends Object
This is a set of JUnit unit tests that test the functionality of an LRU Map.

  • Method Details

    • createLRUMap

      public abstract <K, V> AbstractLRUMap<K,V> createLRUMap(int capacity)
      A factory method that creates a new instance of the LRU Map to be tested.
      Parameters:
      capacity - The maximum number of mappings in the newly-created LRU map
      Returns:
      A new LRU Map with the given capacity
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - A map cannot be created

      public void testNegativeSize()
